"Eddic": "Hey, I got another thing to tell you about."
"If you see anyone lookin' for folks to join them, take 'em up on their offer!"
"Just be like \"Yeah, let's fight together!\" or whatever."
"Don't be shy about it. Be sure to take chances like that and live a little!"
"Oh, not interested? Fair enough, see y'round then."
"Keep putting yourself out there like that! Who knows, maybe I'll see you out there one day, eh?"
"Keep putting yourself out there! Who knows, maybe I'll join up with you out there one day, eh?"
"Oh, right. I should tell you, another way to get allies would be to make a Team."
"Go pay Tim a visit sometime. He's with the Team Support Staff. Tim's a great--"
"...What's that? I already told you? Huh... Did I really?"
"Oh well, don't worry about it. Just try visiting Tim when you've got some time."
